Detailed Description

The core exception class.

This class should be inherited by whatever exception needs to be created, but not thrown as an exception in itself.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

_file The file in which the exception was thrown. (usually specified with __FILE__ by a macro)
_line The line in _file at which the exception was thrown. (usually specified with __LINE__ by a macro)

virtual const char* CoreException::ShowReason (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Returns the exception description.

Should be replaced in any classes inheriting CoreException to properly describe the exception conditions.

Returns:
Exception description ("A core exception has occurred.")

Reimplemented in AssertionFailureException.
